| A nightmare:* has no hands.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* is [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivore "Herbivore").
* can be [tamed by feeding](/wiki/Domestic "Domestic").
* wanders randomly.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                     |

- *This article is about the monster in SporkHack. For other uses, see [Nightmare (disambiguation)](/wiki/Nightmare_\(disambiguation\) "Nightmare (disambiguation)").*

A **nightmare**, u, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SporkHack](/wiki/SporkHack "SporkHack"). Nightmares are [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivorous "Herbivorous") [domestic animals](/wiki/Domestic_animal "Domestic animal") that serve as the [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") equivalent of the [horse](/wiki/Horse "Horse") in the [unicorn or horse](/wiki/Unicorn_or_horse "Unicorn or horse") [monster class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class").

A nightmare has a [kick](/wiki/Kick "Kick") attack and a [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") bite attack, and possesses [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance").

[Eating](/wiki/Eating "Eating") a nightmare [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") confers 1⁄6 [additional poison resistance](/wiki/Partial_intrinsic "Partial intrinsic").

## Generation

Nightmares may be generated as peaceful for chaotic characters.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Nightmare_\(SporkHack\)\&action=edit)*

html:
Nightmare (SporkHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
u nightmare
Difficulty 7
Attacks Kick 1d10, Bite 1d2 poison
u nightmare
Difficulty 7
Attacks

Kick 1d10, Bite 1d2 poison

Base level 5
Base experience 41
Speed 20
Base AC 5
Base MR 0
Alignment -9 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1500
Nutritional value 300
Size Large
Resistances poison
Resistances conveyed poison (+16%)

A nightmare:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is herbivorous.
  • can be tamed by feeding.
  • wanders randomly.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.

This article is about the monster in SporkHack. For other uses, see Nightmare (disambiguation).

A nightmare, u, is a type of monster that appears in SporkHack. Nightmares are herbivorous domestic animals that serve as the chaotic equivalent of the horse in the unicorn or horse monster class.

A nightmare has a kick attack and a poisonous bite attack, and possesses poison resistance.

Eating a nightmare corpse or tin confers 1⁄6 additional poison resistance.

Generation

Nightmares may be generated as peaceful for chaotic characters.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''nightmare''', {{green|u}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[SporkHack]]. Nightmares are [[herbivorous]] [[domestic animal]]s that serve as the [[chaotic]] equivalent of the [[horse]] in the [[unicorn or horse]] [[monster class]].

A nightmare has a [[kick]] attack and a [[poisonous]] bite attack, and possesses [[poison resistance]].

[[Eating]] a nightmare [[corpse]] or [[tin]] confers {{frac|6}} [[Partial intrinsic|additional poison resistance]].

==Generation==
Nightmares may be generated as peaceful for chaotic characters.
